Welcome to License Plate Number Recognition’s documentation!

This Page

  • Show Source

Quick search

License Plate Number Recognition module¶

licenseplatenumberrecognition.detect_license_plate()[source]¶

This function includes the detection of the license plate. Credits to OpenAlpr. The return values are 3 strings: plate, confidence and date. These 3 strings are saved in the MySQL database ‘plates’, in host=’localhost’, port=’3306’.

licenseplatenumberrecognition.get_stream_from_localhost()[source]¶

This function connects to the video stream and fetch the bytes from that stream. The return value is a list with the Start Of Image (SOI) byte, the End Of Image (EOI) byte and the range of bytes between the SOI and EOI. The stream is generated by the software Motion-project.

licenseplatenumberrecognition.main()[source]¶

This is the main function. It measures the script execution time, as well as calling the other functions for the end goal which is detecting whether or not there is a license plate and saving the license plate number as a string, in a database in case there is one.

licenseplatenumberrecognition.print_stream_variables(passed_list)[source]¶

This function functions takes the passed list from the function get_stream_from_localhost(). It uses this list to create and image. The image then is used by the detect_license_plate() function to search for a license plate number.
